resources.string: [da]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[da]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[da]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[da]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[da]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[da]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[da]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[da]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[da]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[da]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[da]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[da]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[da]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[da]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[da]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[da]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[da]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[da]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[da]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[da]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[da]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[da]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[da]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[da]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[da]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[da]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[da]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[da]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[da]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[da]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[da]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>
Tilbudsspecifik stor tekst skal stå i brødteksten
Du har indtastet eller valgt ugyldige parameterværdier. Vælg korrekte parameterværdier, og start igen
[da]I allow Philips to store binary data
[da]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[da]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[da]The actual content of the binary consent help text here

Jeg giver Philips tilladelse til at indsamle oplysninger om appen for at understøtte appens funktion, for at forbedre appen, for at muliggøre integration med sociale medier og for at vise relevant indhold og relevante annoncer.

Meddelelse om cookies

Denne App bruger Adobe Analytics, en analysetjeneste ("Adobe Analytics"), der leveres af Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited ("Adobe"). Adobe Analytics anvender "cookies" eller lignende teknikker, dvs. tekstfiler placeret i din App, for at hjælpe Appen med at analysere de generelle trafikmønstre. Når du overfører oplysningerne fra cookien om brug af Appen til Adobe, anonymiseres IP-adressen før registreringen af din geografiske placering og erstattes af en generisk IP-adresse, før oplysningerne gemmes. På vegne af Philips bruger Adobe disse oplysninger til at evaluere, hvordan du bruger Appen, til at udarbejde rapporter til Philips om appaktivitet og til at levere andre tjenester, som har med appaktivitet og brug af Appen at gøre, til Philips. Adobe knytter ikke din IP-adresse til andre oplysninger, som indehaves af Adobe. Du kan forhindre Adobe og Philips i at indsamle og gøre brug af oplysninger (cookies og IP-adresse), hvis du fravælger det, når du lukker dette skærmbillede.
[da]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

Som et resultat af dit samtykke må Philips' koncernselskaber kontakte dig med salgsfremmende kommunikation via e-mail, sms og andre digitale kanaler, såsom mobilapps og sociale medier. For at kunne tilpasse kommunikationen til dine præferencer og din adfærd og give dig den bedste personlige oplevelse må vi analysere og kombinere dine personlige oplysninger. Disse oplysninger kan omfatte: 

Oplysninger, som du deler med os
Oplysninger, som du aktivt ønsker at dele med os, f.eks.: dit navn, din fødselsdato eller alder, din e-mailadresse, fysiske adresse, dit land, køn, telefonnummer og din profil på sociale medier.

Oplysninger, som vi får via dine interaktioner med Philips
Oplysninger om dine interaktioner med og brug af Philips' digitale kanaler, såsom sociale medier, hjemmesider, e-mails, apps og tilknyttede produkter. Disse oplysninger kan indeholde: IP-adresse, cookies, enhedsoplysninger, kommunikation, som du klikker på, placeringsoplysninger og hjemmesider, du besøger

Philips giver dig mulighed for at tilbagekalde dit samtykke til enhver tid.
Du kan få flere oplysninger ved at læse Philips' meddelelse om beskyttelse af personlige oplysninger og Philips' meddelelse om brugen af cookies.

[da]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here

[da]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[da]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[da]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
